mapper.insert: insert into hangout_info( hangoutcreator, hangoutname, hangoutcontent, hangoutarea, hangoutopendate, hangoutclosedate, hangoutdate, hangoutcategory, hangouttag) values( #{hangoutCreator}, #{hangoutName}, #{hangoutContent}, #{hangoutArea}, #{hangoutOpendate}, #{hangoutClosedate}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), #{hangoutCategory}, #{hangoutTag} )
mapper.update: update hangout_info set hangoutname=#{hangoutName}, hangoutcontent=#{hangoutContent}, hangoutopendate=#{hangoutOpendate}, hangoutclosedate=#{hangoutClosedate}, hangoutdate=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') where hangoutnum=#{hangoutNum};
mapper.select:
SELECT h.hangoutnum, h.hangoutname, h.hangoutcontent, h.hangoutarea, h.hangoutaddress1; h.hangoutaddress2; h.hangoutlat; h.hangoutlng; h.hangoutopendate, h.hangoutclosedate, h.hangoutdate, h.hangoutcategory, h.hangouttag, u.usernum, u.userid, u.username, u.useremail, u.userphone, u.usergender, u.usercountry FROM hangout_info AS h, user_info AS u WHERE 1=1 AND h.hangoutcreator = u.usernum
AND h.hangoutnum = #{hangoutNum}

select hangoutnum, hangoutcreator, hangoutname, hangoutcontent, hangoutarea, hangoutopendate, hangoutclosedate, hangoutdate, hangoutcategory, hangouttag from hangout_info where 1=1
